title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2 projects, it is observed that the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project menu item is not available.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create two projects: P1 and P2. 
2. Select project P2. 
3. Try to close project P2 using the Close Project option.
